nodes.text: Jungle combat gear was a uniform inspired by ancient Sith warriors from Yavin 4. Jungle combat gear was designed to give maximum flexibility for acrobatic martial arts in dense jungle terrain,
Galen Marek wore jungle combat gear on his mission to rescue Bail Prestor Organa.
The Jungle combat gear was first featured in the Force Unleashed video game and was one of the multiple costumes that players could choose to play in.
